id.description: Unique identifier for the transformation step.

name.description: A name assigned to the transformation step.

enabled.description: Indicates if this step is available to be used in a transformation pipeline.

description.description: Additional descriptions of the storage definition.

inputFormat.description: Free-text indication of the format of input data to the step.

outputFormat.description: Free-text indication of the format of the resulting output from the step.
